# Juozas

Man patinka sinusoidÄ—s:

```{r, include=TRUE, echo=TRUE}
a <- 0.3;
b <- 0.5;
x <- 1:24
y <- a * sin(2*pi*(x/24)) + b*cos(2*pi*(x/24))

# Put the data into a data matrix:
dt <- data.table(X=x, Y=y)

# Plot with ggplot
ggplot(dt, aes(X, Y)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  theme_bw()
```
